sec.p: CC: As part of her doctoral thesis she conducted a significant part of the 2010 mosquito collection field-work, executed all PCRs, analysed the data and contributed to the manuscript drafting. NB coordinated most of the field-work and gave significant input to the study design and execution. SP established the conventional filaria PCR diagnostics and contributed substantially to the manuscript drafting. HJ: As part of her doctoral thesis she conducted all 2009 and a big part of the 2010 field-work, did most DNA extractions in conjunction with the arbovirus project and was involved in the data analysis and manuscript drafting. JS-C supervised the lab work, designed the filarial real-time PCR and contributed to the manuscript drafting. AK contributed to the study design and wrote the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final version of the manuscript
